include/lighttpd/array-static.h

00001 #ifndef _ARRAY_STATIC_H_
00002 #define _ARRAY_STATIC_H_
00003 
00004 /* define a generic array of <type>
00005  * */
00006 
00007 #define ARRAY_STATIC_DEF(name, type, extra) \
00008 typedef struct { \
00009         type **ptr; \
00010         size_t used; \
00011         size_t size; \
00012         extra\
00013 } name
00014 
00015 /* all append operations need a 'resize' for the +1 */
00016 
00017 #define ARRAY_STATIC_PREPARE_APPEND(a) \
00018         if (a->size == 0) { \
00019                 a->size = 16; \
00020                 a->ptr = malloc(a->size * sizeof(*(a->ptr))); \
00021         } else if (a->size == a->used) { \
00022                 a->size += 16; \
00023                 a->ptr = realloc(a->ptr, a->size * sizeof(*(a->ptr))); \
00024         }
00025 
00026 #define FOREACH(array, type, element, func) \
00027 do { size_t _i; for (_i = 0; _i < array->used; _i++) { type *element = array->ptr[_i]; func; } } while(0);
00028 
00029 #define STRUCT_INIT(type, var) \
00030         type *var;\
00031         var = calloc(1, sizeof(*var))
00032 
00033 #define ARRAY_STATIC_FREE(array, type, element, func) \
00034         FOREACH(array, type, element, func); \
00035         if(array->ptr) free(array->ptr); \
00036         array->ptr = NULL;
00037 
00038 #endif
